languages.text: "Не усердствуй в своих исследованиях, эльдар. Черта, за которой твое любопытство будет выглядеть как шпионаж, весьма условна".
"Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."
languages.original_text: "Не усердствуй в своих исследованиях, эльдар. Черта, за которой твое любопытство будет выглядеть как шпионаж, весьма условна".

traits.locale_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “不要过于热衷到处打探，艾达灵族。对你而言，适可而止的好奇心与间谍活动之间的界限，恐怕相当模糊。”
languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: “不要过于热衷到处打探，艾达灵族。对你而言，适可而止的好奇心与间谍活动之间的界限，恐怕相当模糊。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Attention à l'excès de zèle, Aeldari. En ce qui vous concerne, la ligne qui sépare la curiosité et l'espionnage est extrêmement ténue. »
languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: « Attention à l'excès de zèle, Aeldari. En ce qui vous concerne, la ligne qui sépare la curiosité et l'espionnage est extrêmement ténue. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Modera tu investigación, Aeldari. En tu caso, la diferencia entre la curiosidad tolerable y el espionaje es extremadamente delgada».
languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: «Modera tu investigación, Aeldari. En tu caso, la diferencia entre la curiosidad tolerable y el espionaje es extremadamente delgada».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「研究熱心になりすぎるなよ、アエルダリ。お前からすれば、許容範囲の好奇心とスパイ行為との境界は紙一重だろう」
languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「研究熱心になりすぎるなよ、アエルダリ。お前からすれば、許容範囲の好奇心とスパイ行為との境界は紙一重だろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Verfolgt Eure Forschungen nicht mit zu großer Leidenschaft, Aeldari. Für Euch ist der Grat zwischen gestatteter Neugier und verbotener Spionage äußerst schmal."
languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Verfolgt Eure Forschungen nicht mit zu großer Leidenschaft, Aeldari. Für Euch ist der Grat zwischen gestatteter Neugier und verbotener Spionage äußerst schmal."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

languages.text: "Etüdün seni fazla heveslendirmesin Aeldari. Ses etmediğimiz merakını bir gün ansızın casusluk olarak görmeye başlayabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "Do not be overzealous in your research, Aeldari. For you, the line between permitted curiosity and espionage will be fine indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Etüdün seni fazla heveslendirmesin Aeldari. Ses etmediğimiz merakını bir gün ansızın casusluk olarak görmeye başlayabiliriz."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
